description.full: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2, Local Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). The arcade classic is back!  Play Discs Of Tron and battle Sark for video-warrior supremacy.  Twelve levels of disc-hurling action await! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.
description.short: Take on the role of the mighty video warrior Tron as you face off against the insidious Sark in the game arena. Dodge and deflect Sarkâ€™s attacks as you attempt to derezz him with a well aimed disc. Unlock the full version to gain access to the full game, multiplayer modes, and the ability to compare scores on the leaderboards!
